timeline.bodyText: Don't we want to inc/dec this counter when the reporters are active in order to send the info?

replies.bodyText: we don't mind, this metric = 1 if an instance is up even if there is no reporter

timeline.author: kevinleturc

timeline.bodyText: What is the wish to start/stop reporters several times?
timeline.author: kevinleturc

replies.bodyText: this is exposed by an automation endpoint better to check that they can be started/stopped multiple times without problem

+/*
+ * (C) Copyright 2020 Nuxeo (http://nuxeo.com/) and others.
+ *
+ * Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License");
+ * you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.

+ * See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
+ * limitations under the License.

+ * Contributors:
+ *     bdelbosc
+ */
+package org.nuxeo.runtime.metrics;
+
+import java.util.Map;
+import java.util.Set;
+
+import io.dropwizard.metrics5.MetricAttribute;
+import io.dropwizard.metrics5.MetricFilter;
+import io.dropwizard.metrics5.MetricRegistry;
+
+/**
+ * @since 11.1
+ */
+public interface MetricsReporter {
+
+    /**
+     * Called on new instance
+     */
+    void init(long pollInterval, Map<String, String> options);
+
+    /**
+     * Starts the metric reporter.
+     */
+    void start(MetricRegistry registry, MetricFilter filter, Set<MetricAttribute> deniedExpansions);
+
+    /**
+     * Stops the metric reporter.

timeline.message: NXP-28795: Add automation operators to stop start Metrics Reporters

NXP-28639: Upgrade to dropwizzard metrics 5

Removing StatsD and CSV Reporters

NXP-28639: Add a NuxeoGraphiteReporter to handle metric with tags

Use tagged metric on WorkManager, Computations, Elasticsearch
and Cache.

For Graphite WorkManager and Elasticsearch metrics have new names.
NXP-28639: Copy coursera DatadogReporter for customization
NXP-28639: Add a NuxeoDatadogRerpoter to handle metric with tags

NXP-28639: Report DLQ Work counter as 0 on start

Cache StreamWorkManager gauges to reduce Kafka round trip.
NXP-28639: Uniformize metric names, use tags when possible
NXP-28696: Reduce the number of metrics
NXP-28760: Change default Datadog poll intervar to 1min
NXP-28639: Remove explicit fluent-hc dependency
NXP-28795: Add automation operators to stop start Metrics Reporters

NXP-28795: Refactor the MetricsService create a reporter EP

Metrics can be enabled, we can choose the instrumentation and filter
can be shared by different reporters.
Add Graphite and Datadog reporters.

NXP-28795: Remove the Datadog addon and package

Datadog is now supported by default in Nuxeo using the MetricsService
NXP-26800: Add opencensus dependency
NXP-26799: Add prometheus metrics reporter
NXP-28639: Add a JMX metric reporter
NXP-28795: Add automation operators to stop start Metrics Reporters
NXP-28795: Add automation operators to stop start Metrics Reporters
